propertyGroup.name: Outlets
propertyGroup.documentation: Defines the locations to which output is generated.

property.name: apiController
property.documentation: The location to which api Controller classes files are generated.

property.name: controller
property.documentation: The location to which Controller classes files are generated.

property.name: implController
property.documentation: The location to which Controller Implementation interface classes files are generated.

property.name: entities
property.documentation: The location to which Entity classes files are generated

property.name: entity-impls
property.documentation: The location to which Entity Implementation classes files are generated

property.name: services
property.documentation: The location to which Service classes files are generated

property.name: service-impls
property.documentation: The location to which Service Implementation classes files are generated

property.name: apiView
property.documentation: Pacote onde serão geradas as classes da camada de visão da API

property.name: implView
property.documentation: Pacote onde serão geradas as classes da camada de visão da implementação para android da API

property.name: impl
property.documentation: Pacote onde serão geradas as classes comuns as camadas da implementação para android da API

property.name: controllers
property.documentation: Pacote onde serão geradas os controllers da visão
